about_the_game:
1. Realistic taste!!!

The fight to catch fish is more intense than it actually is, and you'll be able to get realistic tastes like real fishing with various skills such as swing, stun, hold, and more. I hope you get a firsthand experience of the thrilling joy of catching an objective!!!

2. Hundreds of fish species and various fishing gear!

There are about 960 species, including rare fish species such as giant grouper, albino fish, and mountain hairtail, from common flatfish, stone sea bream, and various fishing equipment according to the characteristics of the fish species.

It's a great opportunity to catch fishing rods and rare objects that you haven't used because they're expensive.

3. gorgeous boats and vast areas

Take a nice boat you've seen in dramas and movies and go fishing in the East/South Asia, the Indian Ocean, the Atlantic Ocean, North America, South America and all over the world!!!

You can enjoy sea fishing with a sea background that gives you a series of exclamations, and a nice boat.

4. Various modes and fish drawings

You can cooperate and confront other users through various game modes such as free mode, individual competition, and group competition,

Fish can be collected, recorded, and stored through a fish drawing.

Along with various modes, you can decorate your own aquarium with unusual fish, big fish, and expensive fish.

5. unique equipment and costumes

The King of Fishing for the Jojo is equipped with unique equipment and costumes for male and female characters, so male characters can decorate a female site with masculine coolness and various beauty.

Show off your own character using various equipment and costumes!!!
